title: Baking Equipment Quiz
description: How well do you know your baking pans, tools, and equipment? Test your knowledge of baking essentials!

questions.question: Which baking pan has a distinctive ring shape with a hollow center tube?
What is a pastry bag (piping bag) used for?
options: Squeezing out frosting, dough, or cream in decorative patterns through a tip

questions.question: Which baking tool is a flat, flexible piece of silicone or rubber used to scrape bowls clean?
What is a springform pan notable for?
options: Having a removable bottom and a clasp that releases the sides, ideal for cheesecakes

questions.question: Which tool is used to sift flour and remove lumps before baking?
What is a bench scraper (dough scraper) used for?
options: Cutting, portioning, and lifting dough, and scraping surfaces clean

questions.question: Which baking item is a heat-resistant mat placed under hot pans to protect countertops?
What is a pastry blender used for?
options: Cutting cold butter into flour for pie crust and biscuit dough

questions.question: Which pan has individual cup-shaped cavities for baking cupcakes and muffins?
What is a cooling rack used for after baking?
options: Allowing air to circulate around baked items so they cool evenly without getting soggy

questions.question: Which tool is inserted into a cake to test if the interior is fully baked?
What is parchment paper used for in baking?
options: Lining pans to prevent sticking and make cleanup easier

questions.question: Which tool has adjustable rings or guides on a rolling pin to ensure dough is rolled to a uniform thickness?
What is a proofing basket (banneton) used for?
options: Holding and shaping bread dough as it rises before baking

questions.question: Which measuring tool is specifically designed with a flat top edge for leveling off dry ingredients?
